form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: NOTICE OF APPROVAL OR REVALIDATION OF IMMIGRANT VISA PETITION

full_text: NITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Room Office Bldg. Broadwa 1220p NOTICE OF APPROVAL OR REVALIDATION OF IMMIGRANT VISA PETITION NAME AND ADDRESS OF PETITIONER NAME OF BENEFICIARY Mr. Julian Juh-Ren Wu 4 Sage Hill Lane Chi-Su Liang Wu CLASSIFICATION FILE NO. Menands, New York 201 (b) A19 320 867 DATE PETITION FILED DATE OF APPROVAL OF PETITION 7-2-1973 01-02-74 VALIDITY: Petition approved for relative is valid for duration of relationship to petitioner and status estab- lished in petition. If petition is for a person in the professions, arts or sciences, or an employee, the approval is valid to Please note the items below which are indicated by "X" marks concerning the visa petition filed by you in behalf of the above beneficiary: 1. YOUR PETITION TO CLASSIFY THE BENEFICIARY AS AN IMMEDIATE RELATIVE OF A UNITED STATES CITIZEN HAS BEEN APPROVED AND FORWARDED THIS COMPLETES ALL ACTION BY THIS SERVICE ON THE PETI- TO THE UNITED STATES CONSULATE AT TION. UNITED STATES CONSULATE, WHICH IS UNDER THE SUPERVISION OF THE DEPARTMENT OF STATE, WILL ADVISE THE BENEFICIARY CON- CERNING THE VISA ISSUANCE. Inquiry concerning visa issuance should be addressed to the Consul. This Service will be unable to answer any inquiry concerning visa issuance. 2. IF YOU THIS OFFICE IMMEDIATELY, GIVING THE DATE OF YOUR NATURALIZATION. AT THE SAME TIME, IF THE PETITION WAS IN BEHALF OF YOUR TO BECOME NATURALIZED AS A CITIZEN OF THE UNITED STATES AND AN IMMIGRANT VISA HAS NOT YET BEEN ISSUED TO THE BENEFICIARY, NOTIFY SON OR DAUGHTER, ALSO ADVISE WHETHER THAT PERSON IS STILL UNMARRIED. THIS INFORMATION MAY EXPEDITE THE ISSUANCE OF A VISA THE BENEFICIARY. 3. YOUR PETITION FOR PREFERENCE CLASSIFICATION, AS SHOWN ABOVE, HAS BEEN APPROVED BY THE SERVICE AND FORWARDED TO THE UNITED THIS COMPLETES ALL ACTION BY THIS SERVICE ON THE PETITION. STATES CONSULATE AT THIS JURISDICTION OF THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF STATE. UNDER THE LAW ONLY A LIMITED NUMBER OF VISAS MAY BE ISSUED BY THE SAME CLAS- SERVICE HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH THE ACTUAL ISSUANCE OF VISAS. VISAS ARE ISSUED ONLY BY UNITED STATES CONSULS THAT WHO DEPARTMENT ARE UNDER THE DURING EACH YEAR AND THEY MUST BE ISSUED STRICTLY IN THE CHRONOLOGICAL ORDER IN WHICH PETITIONS WERE FILED FOR HIM AND CON- SIFICATION. SIDER ISSUANCE OF THE VISA. Inquiry concerning visa issuance should be addressed to the Consul. This Service will be unable to answer any inquiry con- WHEN THE BENEFICIARY'S TURN IS REACHED ON THE VISA WAITING LIST, THE UNITED STATES CONSUL WILL INFORM cerning visa issuance. THE PETITION HAS BEEN APPROVED. THE PETITION STATES THAT THE BENEFICIARY IS IN THE UNITED STATES AND WILL APPLY TO BECOME BY A LAW- THE 4. FUL BENEFICIARY IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE INSTRUCTIONS CONTAINED THEREIN. (IF THE BENEFICIARY HAD PREVIOUSLY SUBMITTED FORM PERMANENT RESIDENT. THE ENCLOSED APPLICATION FOR THIS PURPOSE (FORM 1-485) SHOULD BE COMPLETED AND SUBMITTED 1-485 WHICH WAS RETURNED TO HIM, HE SHOULD RESUBMIT THAT FORM.) within 30 days. 5. THE PETITION HAS BEEN APPROVED. THE BENEFICIARY WILL BE INFORMED OF THE DECISION MADE ON HIS PENDING APPLICATION TO BECOME A LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENT (FORM 1-485). THE PETITION HAS BEEN APPROVED. THE PETITION STATES THAT THE BENEFICIARY IS IN THE UNITED STATES AND WILL APPLY TO BECOME MAY A LAW- NOT 6. FUL PERMANENT RESIDENT. HOWEVER, AN IMMIGRANT VISA NUMBER IS NOT PRESENTLY AVAILABLE, THEREFORE, THE BENEFICIARY APPLY TO BECOME A PERMANENT RESIDENT. 7. THE PETITION HAS BEEN APPROVED. HOWEVER, SINCE THE BENEFICIARY IS A NATIVE OF THE WESTERN HEMISPHERE, HE IS INELIGIBLE TO BE- COME A LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENT OTHER THAN BY DEPARTING FROM THE UNITED STATES AND REENTERING IN POSSESSION OF AN IMMI- GRANT VISA ISSUED BY AN AMERICAN CONSUL. 8. THE PETITION HAS BEEN REVALIDATED AND FORWARDED TO THE UNITED STATES CONSULATE AT WHICH THE BENEFICIARY WILL APPLY FOR A VISA. ANY INQUIRY CONCERNING THE ISSUANCE OF A VISA SHOULD BE DIRECTED TO THE CONSULATE AT This Service will be unable to answer any inquiry concerning visa issuance. THE PETITION HAS BEEN REVALIDATED. NO NOTICE OF REVALIDATION OF THE PETITION HAS BEEN SENT TO A UNITED STATES CONSULATE AS IT 9. HAS BEEN INDICATED THAT THE BENEFICIARY IS APPLYING TO BECOME A LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENT. 10. REMARKS: 11. DOCUMENTS WHICH YOU SUBMITTED IN SUPPORT OF YOUR PETITION HAVE SERVED OUR PURPOSE AND ARE RETURNED. VERY William H TRULY YOURS, backley fill DISTRICT DIRECTOR Form I-171 (Rev. 11-3-69) THIS COPY TO BE MAILED TO THE ATTORNEY OR REPRESENTATIVE, IF ANY.
